00036 class HtmlConverterException : public Exception
00037 {
00038     public: 
00039         
00046         HtmlConverterException(const char * const msg = "Unknown exception")
00047             : m_msg(msg)
00048         { }
00049         
00054         virtual const char* what() const throw()
00055         {
00056             return m_msg.c_str();
00057         }   
00058 
00059     private:
00060 
00065         std::string m_msg;      
00066 };

00074 class HtmlConverterProgrammerErrorException : public InternalProgrammerErrorException
00075 {
00076     public:
00077         
00083         HtmlConverterProgrammerErrorException() 
00084             : m_exception(new HtmlConverterException) 
00085         { } 
00086         
00093         HtmlConverterProgrammerErrorException(const char * const e)
00094             : m_exception(new HtmlConverterException(e))
00095         { }
00096         
00100         virtual const char* what() const throw()
00101         {
00102             return m_exception->what();
00103         }
00104 
00109         virtual ~HtmlConverterProgrammerErrorException()
00110         {
00111             delete m_exception;
00112         }
00113 
00114     private:
00115 
00119         Exception *m_exception;
00120 };
